title: About account recovery
body:
3 days ago someone got into my email and requested a password and email change to my league of legends account. I send a ticket to riot and I got my account back but I'm wondering if the hacker can send a ticket and get into my account again. I have the original email and I dont think he can get into it because I've put phone security and stuff. 

I'm really nervous because I spend around 1000$ on it and just the thought that someone went into my account got me scared as hell. 
So I'm asking again, is it possible for them to get access to my account again by any means other than going into my email or sending a fake ticket to riot support?

replies.body: As long as you've updated and secured your information, you should be fine.  Our account team is very careful to only restore access to the account owner.  I recommend using our [account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide as an added measure to make sure everything is secure in and outside of league.  Helps
If you changed all passwords it shouldnt be possible for him. If you want to be completly Sure Send a ticket to the support what you can to to increase your security
